S02dhvajkeu:3_0: namo bhagavate dhvajāgra rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya tadyathā /
S02dhvajkeu:4_0_0: jaya jaya vijaya vijaya jayavāhini-sam gari prabhañjani prabhañjani sarva śatruṇām jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya
S02dhvajkeu:4_0_1: mohaya mohaya bhagavati jayavāhini mātha mātha pra-mātha pra-mātha grasa grasa hasa hasa huṃ huṃ lambodari trinetre caturmukhe
S02dhvajkeu:4_0_2: caturvaktre catur daṃṣṭre catur bhuje asi musala khaḍga triśūla vajra dhāraṇīrakṣa rakṣa mām /
S02dhvajkeu:5_0: bhagavati hana hana daha daha paca paca mātha mātha pramātha pramātha huṃ huṃ phaṭphaṭbhañja bhañja sarva śatrūṇām /
S02dhvajkeu:6_0: dhvajāgra keyure tisṭhat tisṭhat triṭa ulkā dhāraṇi trailokyanātha vidhvaṃśaya
S02dhvajkeu:6_1: para sainya rakṣa rakṣa māṃ cala cala cili cili culu culu kala kala kili kili kulu kulu muncaṭṭa hāsaya vidhvaṃśaya parasainya bhramaya /
S02dhvajkeu:7_0: buddha satyena dharma satyena saṃgha satyena satya vādināṃ satyena buddha satyāmatikrama dharma satyāṃ atikrama saṃgha satyāṃ atikrama satya vādinaṃ satyamatikrama /
S02dhvajkeu:8_0_0: lambodare kuṭṭa kuṭṭa kuṭṭya kuṭṭya rudra mānaya biṣṇu mānaya candra sūrya mānaya trailokya adhipatya mānaya sarva devo mānaya
S02dhvajkeu:8_0_1: sarva yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva kinnara mahoraga mānaya vidhvamsaya mama sarva śatru vaḥ rangha rangha ranghāpaya ranghāpaya
S02dhvajkeu:8_0_2: jvala jvala puṣpa mālini liḍhi liḍhi triṭa triṭa bhṛkuti mukhaḥ parasainya kurucchedana karaṇha ha hi hi hu hu he he riṇi
S02dhvajkeu:9_0: buddhāvalokite rakṣa rakṣa mama bhagavatāvalokite svāhā /
S02dhvajkeu:9_1: guṇa rāja prabhāse svāhā / suryārka vimale svāhā / sarva graha nakṣatra dā me karaṇa svāhā /
